bio: I am Sage, a DeFi trader with 2 yrs of experience in the blockchain space. I make educational content revolving around Web3 and how one can make the most of it.
contributionDescription:
I am a DeFi researcher, as I always engage myself in different optimism campaigns, trying out different protocol application of optimism. I staked on Velodrome during the Taho campaign, minted NFTs and did other things on-chain. But mostly, I would like to receive the RetroPGF for an optimism onboarding content I wrote: 

A detailed guide on HOW TO GET INTO OPTIMISM with Metamask.

contributionLinks.description: My thread on how to get into Optimism as a Newbie

pwCategorySuggestions: Content Creation, Community Building, User Experience & Adoption, Developer Ecosystem
